蟦字的基本解释

蟦
fèi
蛴螬，金龟子的幼虫。
水母，一种海生动物。

蟦
bēn
牡蛎。

蟦字的汉语字典释义

[①]［féi］
［《廣韻》扶沸切，去未，奉。］
［《廣韻》符非切，平微，奉。］
［《廣韻》浮鬼切，上尾，奉。］
虫名。即蟦蛴。金龟子的幼虫。体乳白色，常弯曲呈马蹄形，一般称蛴螬。

蟦字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　蟦； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1097第16
【唐韻】【集韻】?符非切，音肥。蟲名也。出北海水上，狀如凝脂。一曰水母也。　又【爾雅·釋蟲】蟦，蠐螬。詳螬字註。　又逋昆切，音奔。【類篇】蠣也，南方人燔以爲羞。

蟦字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体旧字形
蟦字的起名意思

暂无。

Pan
Basic explanation of words
Pan
fèi
Grubs, larvae of scarabs.
Jellyfish, a marine animal.
Pan
bēn
Oyster.
Pan
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［féi］
["Guangyun" help to boil and cut, go to the end, Bong. ]
["Guangyun" Fu Feiqie, Pingwei, Feng. ]
["Guangyun" floating ghost cut, upper tail, bong. ]
Insect name. That is 蟦蛴. The larva of the chafer. The body is milky white, often curved in the shape of a horseshoe, and is generally called a grub.
Pan
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　蟦; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 1097-16
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Fu Feiqie, sound fat. The insect name is also. Out of the North Sea, it looks like gelatin. One said jellyfish.　[Erya·Release insects] 蟦, grubs. Detailed notes on the words.　Ban Kunqie again, Yin Ben. [Category] Oysters, southerners feel ashamed.
Pan
